C_EN: Meet the make - up water demand of closed systems

question_en: Compared with constant - speed equipment, how much can the energy cost of the DE6800Q pressurized unit be reduced?

B: 艾蒙斯特朗无比先进的工厂

D_EN: Reduce the number of maintenance personnel

question_en: What are the advantages of DE6800 compared with competing pressurized units?

A_EN: Maintain the pressure in the system
B_EN: Meet a small amount of water demand
C_EN: Allow the pump to stop when the system demand is low

question_en: Which of the following components are standard components of DE6800Q?

D: 高级控制功能和用户界面
question_en: What are the advantages of DE6800Q?
B_EN: Energy - saving analysis for building water use
D_EN: Advanced control functions and user interface

question_zh: DE6800Q 的标准承压 （ ）
question_en: What are the standard pressure ratings of DE6800Q?

question_zh: DE6800Q 增压机组的应用场景包括（ ）。
A: 为建筑物居民提供淡水
B: 为建筑物设备提供淡水
D: 增加水库水压力满足上层需求
question_en: What are the application scenarios of the DE6800Q pressurized unit?
A_EN: Provide fresh water for building residents
B_EN: Provide fresh water for building equipment
C_EN: Increase the pressure of municipal water
D_EN: Increase the pressure of reservoir water to meet the demands of upper floors

question_zh: DE6800Q 增压机组在施工阶段的优势（ ）。
A: 真正的即插即用：工厂组装缩短安装时间
B: 小巧设计，可更轻松地在现场运输。安装占地面积小，可减少空间要求和初期装机总成本
C: 所有增压系统相关配件的一站式供应商，最大限度减轻项目协调压力
D: 集管可散件运输（可选）减少增压系统运送到机房途中所需的时间和麻烦
question_en: What are the advantages of the DE6800Q pressurized unit during the construction stage?
A_EN: True plug - and - play: Factory assembly shortens the installation time
B_EN: Compact design for easier on - site transportation. Small installation footprint reduces space requirements and the total initial installation cost
C_EN: One - stop supplier for all pressurization system - related accessories, minimizing project coordination pressure
D_EN: The manifold can be shipped in parts (optional), reducing the time and trouble required to transport the pressurization system to the machine room

question_zh: DE6800Q 增压机组的 DEPM 电机优势包括（ ）。
question_en: What are the advantages of the DEPM motor in the DE6800Q pressurized unit?

question_zh: 与竞品相比，DE6800Q 增压机组在材料和结构上的优势有（ ）。
question_en: What are the advantages of the DE6800Q pressurized unit in terms of materials and structure compared with competing products?

question_zh: DE6800Q 增压机组进行能耗分析时，可提供的数据有（ ）。
question_en: What data can be provided when the DE6800Q pressurized unit conducts energy - consumption analysis?

question_zh: DE6800Q 增压机组在调试阶段的优势（）。
A: 能够将多个压力传感器与单独的设定点连接，加快多区 / 多设定点系统的调试
B: 直观的全彩色触摸屏，导航和系统启动更轻松
C: 专用调试模式，支持增压系统在系统启动期间满负荷运行。调试后返回正常运行模式，以最大限度地减少能源浪费和不必要的设备磨损
D: 真正的即插即用：工厂组装套件，已根据设计条件进行了预调试。减少调试过程的时间要求和复杂程度
question_en: What are the advantages of the DE6800Q pressurized unit during the commissioning stage?
A_EN: Ability to connect multiple pressure sensors to separate setpoints, speeding up the commissioning of multi - zone/multi - setpoint systems
B_EN: Intuitive full - color touch screen for easier navigation and system startup
C_EN: Dedicated commissioning mode that supports the full - load operation of the pressurization system during system startup. After commissioning, it returns to normal operation mode to minimize energy waste and unnecessary equipment wear
D_EN: True plug - and - play: Factory - assembled kits are pre - commissioned according to design conditions, reducing the time requirements and complexity of the commissioning process

question_zh: DE6800Q 增压机组集成了高效的（ ）。
question_en: What efficient components does the DE6800Q pressurized unit integrate?

question_zh: DE6800Q 增压机组中稳压罐的作用有（ ）。
B: 提供少量需求，允许泵停机
D: 吸收或施加压力，在低需求时高效供水
question_en: What are the functions of the pressure - stabilizing tank in the DE6800Q pressurized unit?
A_EN: Maintain the pressure of the pipeline system
B_EN: Meet a small amount of demand and allow the pump to stop
C_EN: Prevent the pump from starting frequently
D_EN: Absorb or apply pressure to supply water efficiently during low - demand periods

question_zh: ARMSTRONG DE 智能变频增压系统的优势包括（ ）。
C: 易于安装，无需现场额外接线或装配
D: 可单独维修和更换不同泵，缩短停机时间
question_en: What are the advantages of the ARMSTRONG DE intelligent variable - frequency pressurization system?
B_EN: Multiple pump configurations for flexible design
C_EN: Easy to install, no additional on - site wiring or assembly required
D_EN: Separate repair and replacement of different pumps, shortening downtime

question_zh: 与感应电机 + 集成 VFD 相比，DEPM 电机在效率方面的优势体现在（ ）。
A: 功率越小时相较于感应电机效率更高
question_en: Compared with an induction motor + integrated VFD, where does the efficiency advantage of the DEPM motor lie?
A_EN: Higher efficiency than induction motors when the power is lower

question_zh: DE6800Q 增压机组的多电压额定值包括（ ）。
question_en: What are the multi - voltage ratings of the DE6800Q pressurized unit?

question_zh: DE6800 在运行和维护方面的优势（ ）
A: 诸如最佳效率控制、压力重设和水箱填充模式等高级控制功能，可额外降低 10 - 15% 的能耗。
B: 预定义套件考虑了增压系统的实际运行范围，从而降低了因能耗、用水量、水浪费、维护需求和突发停机而导致的全生命周期运行成本。
C: 直观的全彩色触摸屏 HMI 提供详细的分析（不同时间的流量消耗、能耗、当前流量 / 能量），可提供可操作的见解。
D: 所有增压系统相关配件（+ 其他解决方案产品）的一站式供应商，最大限度减轻项目协调压力。
E: 应急电源模式确保增压系统满足关键需求，不会耗尽发电机 / 备用电源。
question_en: What are the advantages of DE6800 in terms of operation and maintenance?
A_EN: Advanced control functions such as optimal efficiency control, pressure reset, and tank filling mode can further reduce energy consumption by 10 - 15%.
B_EN: Pre - defined kits consider the actual operating range of the pressurization system, reducing the full - life - cycle operating costs caused by energy consumption, water consumption, water waste, maintenance requirements, and unexpected shutdowns.
C_EN: Intuitive full - color touch - screen HMI provides detailed analysis (flow consumption, energy consumption, current flow/energy at different times), providing actionable insights.
D_EN: One - stop supplier for all pressurization system - related accessories (+ other solution products), minimizing project coordination pressure.
E_EN: Emergency power mode ensures that the pressurization system meets critical demands without depleting the generator/backup power supply.

question_zh: DE6800Q 增压机组具有以下哪些功能（ ）。
question_en: What functions does the DE6800Q pressurized unit have?

question_zh: DE6800Q 增压机组的应用特性有哪些（ ）。
question_en: What are the application features of the DE6800Q pressurized unit?

question_zh: DE6800 承压只有 PN16 的。（ ）
question_en: The pressure rating of DE6800 is only PN16. ( )

question_zh: DEPM6800 泵组单台水泵功率最大为 11KW。（ ）
question_en: The maximum power of a single water pump in the DEPM6800 pump set is 11KW. ( )

question_zh: Armstrong 增压机组标配 PN16 和 PN25 两种承压等级。（ ）
question_en: Armstrong pressurized units are standard - equipped with two pressure ratings, PN16 and PN25. ( )

question_zh: 增压机组 IE3 电机单台最大功率为 45KW（ ）
question_en: The maximum power of a single IE3 motor in a pressurized unit is 45KW. ( )

question_zh: Armstrong DE6800 标准 2 - 5 台水泵。（ ）
question_en: The standard number of water pumps in Armstrong DE6800 is 2 - 5. ( )

question_zh: DE6800Q 主要用于空调闭式系统。（ ）
question_en: DE6800Q is mainly used in closed - loop air - conditioning systems. ( )

question_zh: Armstrong DE6800Q 撬块配置水泵只有感应电机 / IE3 立式多级泵。（ ）
question_en: The pumps configured in the Armstrong DE6800Q skid are only induction motors/IE3 vertical multi - stage pumps. ( )

question_zh: Armstrong DE6800Q 流量最大可以达到 612m³/h，扬程 280m。（ ）
question_en: The maximum flow rate of Armstrong DE6800Q can reach 612m³/h with a head of 280m. ( )

question_zh: DE6800Q 可以单个泵控制，也可以集中控制。（ ）
question_en: DE6800Q can be controlled individually for each pump or centrally. ( )

question_zh: 在一次变流量多台冷机制冷系统中，无需 IPS, 可以通过设置主泵，来保护冷冻机，满足冷冻机蒸发器和冷凝器对最小流量的要求。（ ）
question_en: In a primary variable - flow multi - chiller refrigeration system, without an IPS, the chiller can be protected by setting the main pump to meet the minimum flow requirements of the chiller evaporator and condenser. ( )

question_zh: Armstrong DE6800Q 具有软注水，压力定降，泵交替运行等先进功能。（ ）
question_en: Armstrong DE6800Q has advanced functions such as soft filling, pressure droop setting, and pump alternation operation. ( )

question_zh: Armstrong DE6800Q 增压机组标配本地传感器，可以选配远程传感器作为冗余传感器。（ ）
question_en: The Armstrong DE6800Q pressurized unit is standard - equipped with local sensors and can be optionally equipped with remote sensors as redundant sensors. ( )

question_zh: Armstrong DE6800Q 增压机组可启用或禁用无流量关停功能。（ ）
question_en: The Armstrong DE6800Q pressurized unit can enable or disable the no - flow shutdown function. ( )

question_zh: Armstrong DE6800Q 增压机组最多可设置 6 个备用设定点，（ ）
question_en: The Armstrong DE6800Q pressurized unit can set up to 6 standby setpoints. ( )

question_zh: Soft fill 模式，可降低首次启动期间和断电后水锤相关的风险和成本。在施工阶段（需求极低且罕见）尤其重要。( )
question_en: The Soft fill mode can reduce the risks and costs related to water hammer during the first startup and after a power failure. It is particularly important during the construction stage (when demand is extremely low and rare). ( )

question_zh: DE6800Q 具有水泵交替运行功能，避免长时间一台水泵连续运行。（ ）
question_en: DE6800Q has the function of pump alternation operation to avoid continuous operation of a single pump for a long time. ( )

question_zh: DE6800Q 增压机组只有高吸入压力关停功能，不具备低吸入压力关停功能. （ ）
question_en: The DE6800Q pressurized unit only has a high - suction - pressure shutdown function and does not have a low - suction - pressure shutdown function. ( )

question_zh: 增压器具备报警功能，不能记录故障。（ ）
question_en: The supercharger has an alarm function but cannot record faults. ( )

question_zh: DE6800Q 增压机组的总功率最大为 250kW。（ ）
question_en: The maximum total power of the DE6800Q pressurized unit is 250kW. ( )

question_zh: 稳压罐能维持管道系统压力并提供少量需求，允许泵停机。（ ）
question_en: The pressure - stabilizing tank can maintain the pressure of the pipeline system, meet a small amount of demand, and allow the pump to stop. ( )

question_zh: 在计算增压供水机组的压力时，我们需要考虑哪些值？
question_en: What values do we need to consider when calculating the pressure of a pressurized water supply unit?
answer: 机组损失、沿程阻力损失、静压、余压，增压器入口压力

question_zh: 什么是高层建筑增压供水的解决方案？
question_en: What is the solution for high - rise building pressurized water supply?
answer: 不同高度不同区域使用不同的增压泵组。对于较高的区域，使用额外的增压泵组。

question_zh: 稳压罐的作用以及安装方式有哪些？
question_en: What are the functions and installation methods of the pressure - stabilizing tank?
answer: 维持管道系统中的压力，并提供少量需求，以允许泵停机。撬块安装、相邻安装、屋顶安装
